uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.logging.log4j2

Class Log4JContextFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.logging.log4j2.Log4JContextFilter

  • public class Log4JContextFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    A Filter to add ThreadContext information for use by Log4J logging. This needs to be called after the ErrorFilter so needs to be installed using an XML config file
